ingredients.content: 10 g fresh root ginger, peeled, cut in round slices (2 mm)
300 g Granny Smith apples, quartered, plus extra slices for garnish
100 g green grapes, plus extra for garnish

preparations.content: Place linseeds in mixing bowl and grind <b>20 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place water in mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/100Â°C/speed 1<b>.
Add teabag then transfer to a bowl and leave to infuse and cool completely. Discard teabag.

Place spinach, kale, ginger, apples, grapes, honey, reserved ground linseeds and cooled tea in mixing bowl then blend <b>1-2 min/speed 9<b>, until desired texture. Serve over ice, garnished with apple slices and grapes.
